generated_body: The article titled "Powerful side-by-side portraits show people over 100 years old next to their younger selves" is likely to explore the theme of aging through a visual format. Readers can expect to see striking photographic comparisons that highlight the physical changes individuals experience over the decades. The piece may include stories or insights from these centenarians, discussing their life experiences and reflections on aging. Additionally, it could touch on the cultural significance of aging and how perceptions of youth and old age have evolved over time.
